items.title: Christmas weather forecast from California storm to Northeast snow
items.description: This year is expected to be the busiest on record for holiday travel, but rough weather can make getting to your Christmas destination even harder.

items.title: WATCH:  The family paying big for their holiday display
items.description: One Maryland family was told by their homeowners' association to scale back their decorations or face fines. ABC News' Sophie Flay reports.
